DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect diabetes prevention program provide nurse practitioner primary care adult risk diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: A Lifestyle Change Program Prevent Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria age 21 old medically stable safe exercise high risk type 2 diabetes able speak English . Exclusion Criteria Type 2 diabetes Cardiovascular disease Cancer require treatment past 5 year Anemia Hepatitis Renal disease Gastrointestinal disease Recent significant abdominal surgery Pulmonary disease dependence oxygen daily use bronchodilator Chronic infection ( ie. , HIV , active tuberculosis ) Unable walk 0.25 mile 10 minute Participation commercial diet program Currently pregnant within 3 month postpartum Currently nurse within 6 week complete nursing Treatment impair glucose tolerance ( IGT ) metformin Currently take glucocorticoid betablocker Recently prescribe change dose statin ( within 2 month )
